title: YouTube Channel Scraper Output
description: Output data schema for YouTube Channel Apify Actor

channelName.description: The name of the YouTube channel

channelSubscriberCount.description: Number of channel subscribers (Note: Currently returns 0 due to YouTube's dynamic loading)

channelVideosCount.description: Total number of videos on the channel

joinedDate.description: Date when the channel was created

totalViewCount.description: Total views across all channel videos

channelLocation.description: Geographic location of the channel (if provided)

channelDescription.example: High-intensity code tutorials and tech news...

channelProfileImageURL.description: URL of the channel's profile image/avatar

channelEmail.description: Email addresses found in channel description

channelPhone.description: Phone numbers found in channel description

youtubeUrls.description: All YouTube URLs found on the channel page

instagramUrls.description: Instagram profile URLs linked from the channel

twitterUrls.description: Twitter/X profile URLs linked from the channel

facebookUrls.description: Facebook page/profile URLs linked from the channel

linkedinUrls.description: LinkedIn profile URLs linked from the channel

pinterestUrls.description: Pinterest profile URLs linked from the channel

redditUrls.description: Reddit profile/subreddit URLs linked from the channel

tumblrUrls.description: Tumblr blog URLs linked from the channel

twitchUrls.description: Twitch channel URLs linked from the channel

onlyfansUrls.description: OnlyFans profile URLs linked from the channel

soundcloudUrls.description: SoundCloud profile URLs linked from the channel

discordUrls.description: Discord server invite URLs linked from the channel

patreonUrls.description: Patreon page URLs linked from the channel

githubUrls.description: GitHub profile/organization URLs linked from the channel

tiktokUrls.description: TikTok profile URLs linked from the channel

spotifyUrls.description: Spotify artist/profile URLs linked from the channel

websiteUrls.description: General website URLs (non-social media) linked from the channel

scrapedAt.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the data was scraped

processingTime.description: Time taken to scrape the channel in milliseconds
